title: riot games support bug
body: yo so i sent a ticket to riot support but i cant send anymore this is what i get http://prntscr.com/fykxos there is no way i can send it help

replies.body: I'm not exactly sure what's I'm seeing here.  Toss me some more context so I can get a better idea of what's going on.  What's your ticket number?  Are you still able to select the Submit button?
